attributes.action: That the unrivaled sporting achievement of Phil ' the power ' Taylor be recognise in the honours list
attributes.additional_details:
For the Government recognise and honour the significance and importance of the achievements of a working class man in the sport of darts.
 His exploits are legend, no sportsman in any discipline has achieved more success than Phil the power Taylor.  He is the consummate professional and inspiration.
 The message he puts across is that hard work and dedication are all it takes to succeed in sport and in life.  Phil 'the Power ' Taylor should receive a Knighthood in the honours list
